   //<!--
/* <![CDATA[ (head-cquotient.js) */
var CQuotient = window.CQuotient = {};
CQuotient.clientId = 'aang-ysl-us';
CQuotient.activities = [];
CQuotient.cqcid='';
CQuotient.cquid='';
CQuotient.initFromCookies = function () {
	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
	for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
	  var c = ca[i];
	  while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
	  if (c.indexOf('cqcid=') == 0) {
		  CQuotient.cqcid=c.substring('cqcid='.length,c.length);
	  } else if (c.indexOf('cquid=') == 0) {
		  CQuotient.cquid=c.substring('cquid='.length,c.length);
		  break;
	  }
	}
}
CQuotient.getCQCookieId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cqcid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cqcid;
};
CQuotient.getCQUserId = function () {
	if(window.CQuotient.cquid == '')
		window.CQuotient.initFromCookies();
	return window.CQuotient.cquid;
};
/* ]]> */

  <script type="text/javascript">
   loraDeferredScripts.push({
            execute: function() {
        
            lpTag.sdes = lpTag.sdes || [];
            
                lpTag.sdes.push( {"type":"ctmrinfo","info":{"ctype":null}} );
            
            lpTag.section = ["Home Page"];
            var firstTry = true, tryAgain;
            var _lpStopTrying = function() {
                clearInterval( tryAgain );
            };

            var startLETag = function() {
                if ( lpTag.start ) {
                    //Setting the isDom var to true because the dom already loaded
                    lpTag.isDom = true;

                    lpTag.start(); // call the start function
                    _lpStopTrying(); // cancel any repeat timers that are running
                    var pageContext = lpTag.section.join('-').replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9-_]/g, '').toLowerCase();
                    var divIdsToKeep = {};
                    var buttonsList = "";
                    if(buttonsList !== '') {
                        divIdsToKeep = buttonsList.split(',').reduce(function(obj,el){
                            obj[el] = true;
                            return obj
                        }, {});
                    };
                    if (lpTag.newPage && pageContext.indexOf("checkout") >= 0) {
                        var newPageURL = 'https://' + window.location.hostname + '/' + pageContext;
                        lpTag.newPage(newPageURL, {});
                    };
                }
                else if( firstTry ) {
                    firstTry = false;
                    tryAgain = setInterval( startLETag, 100 );
                }
            };
            startLETag();
        

        $(document).on('couponsCallbackError', function(event, data) {
            if('lpTag' in window){
                lpTag.sdes.push({
                    type: "error",
                    error: {
                        message: data.msg,
                        code: "LPERRMULTCOUPONS"
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        $(document).on('addressValidationError', function(event, data) {
            if('lpTag' in window){
                lpTag.sdes.push({
                    type: "error",
                    error: {
                        message: (typeof data != "undefined" && typeof data.msg != "undefined") ? data.msg : '',
                        code: "LPERRADDRINVALID"
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        $(document).on('checkout.sectionchange', function(e, step){
            var sections = ["checkout"];
            if('currentStep' in step) sections.push(step.currentStep);

            var sdes = [];
            sdes.push(  );

            var divIdsToKeep = {}
            var buttonsList = "";
            if(buttonsList !== '') {
                divIdsToKeep = buttonsList.split(',').reduce(function(obj,el){
                    obj[el] = true;
                    return obj
                }, {});
            };
            if( typeof(lpTag) !== "undefined" && typeof(lpTag.newPage) == "function"){
                if (sections.indexOf("checkout") >= 0) {
                    var newPageURL = "https://" + window.location.hostname + '/' + sections.join('-').replace(/\s/g, "-");
                } else {
                    var newPageURL = location.href;
                }
                lpTag.sdes= lpTag.sdes || [];
                lpTag.newPage(newPageURL, {
                    section : sections,
                    sdes: sdes,
                    taglets: {
                        rendererStub:{
                            divIdsToKeep: divIdsToKeep
                          }
                    }
                });
            }
        });
        
            }});
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   function includeStyleSheets(filename){
        var fileref=document.createElement("link");

        fileref.setAttribute("rel", "stylesheet");
        fileref.setAttribute("type", "text/css");
        fileref.setAttribute("href", filename);
        document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(fileref);
    };


    includeStyleSheets("/on/demandware.static/Sites-ysl-us-Site/-/en_US/v1529668434672/css/responsive.css?page=page");
   
    if ('isMobileUserAgent' in app && app.isMobileUserAgent) {
         $(document).ready(function(){
             $(".header a.logo").before('<a id="hic_menu">Menu</a>');
             $("#hic_menu").click(function(){$(".navigation_header").click();});
         });
    };

    // Block click event of button and anchor tag
    window.allJsLoaded = false;
    $(document).on("click",".js_addtocart", function(event){
        lastEventElement = $(this);
        if(window.allJsLoaded){
            allEventsResume(lastEventElement);
        }else{
            event.preventDefault();
        }
    });

    // Resume click event of button and anchor tag
    function allEventsResume(lastEventElement){
        $(document).off("click",".js_addtocart", function(event){
        });
        lastEventElement.trigger("click");
    }

    // Fall back to set the flag true if js loading fails
    $(window).load(function(){
        window.allJsLoaded = true;
        $(".js_addtocart").removeClass("block-events");
    });
  </script>

        right: auto;
    }

.ui-dialog-titlebar-close",function(){setTimeout(function(){null!=window.cs_dyn_page&&(window._uxa.push(["trackPageview",window.cs_dyn_page]),window.cs_dyn_page=null)},500)}),jQuery(document).on("quickview.opened",function(){window.cs_dyn_page=window.cs_old_page,setTimeout(function(){null!=window.cs_dyn_page&&window._uxa.push(["trackPageview",app.page.trackerData.page+"quickview"])},500)}),jQuery(document).on("click",".quickview a=document.createElement("script");a.type="text/javascript",a.async=!0,a.src="//d1m6l9dfulcyw7.cloudfront.net/uxa/"+e+".js",document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(a)};try{"undefined"!=typeof     $('.mobile.no-desktop .header .content').css('padding','0px 15px');
  
    $('.pt_howtovideos .video-cover-container').click(function(event) {
  
      var videoContainer = $('.pt_howtovideos .video-container.video-global-container');
  
      var ytID = videoContainer.attr("data-video-id");
  
      if ($(".ytplayer .pt_howto iframe").length < 1) {
        $(".ytplayer .pt_howto").html('<iframe class="player-yt" id="'+ytID+'"  frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="1" title="YouTube video player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/'+ytID+'?rel=0&amp;enablejsapi=1&amp;"></iframe>');
      }
  
      videoContainer.find('.ytplayer').removeClass('hidden');
      videoContainer.find('.video-cover-container').addClass('hidden');
      videoContainer.find('span').addClass('hidden');
      videoContainer.find('.video-infos-container').addClass('hidden');
  
    });
  
    $('.mobile.no-desktop .pt_howtovideos .video-cover-container').addClass("hidden");
    $('.mobile.no-desktop .pt_howtovideos .video-header-video-container').removeClass("hidden");
  
  });

     <script type="text/javascript">
      jQuery(document).ready(function(){
  
  $(document).on('jcarousel:createend', '.product_tile .swatch_carousel_tile', function(event, carousel) {
              // "this" refers to the root element
              // "carousel" is the jCarousel instance
              var $this= $(this);
              if ($this.closest('.product_tile').length) {
                  if ($this.find('.jcarousel-next').hasClass('disabled')) {
                      $this.find('ul.contentcarousel_list').addClass('aligned-items');
                  }
              }
          });
  
      $(".level_1_list_item").on("touchstart", function(e) {
        if (app.isTabletUserAgent && $(window).width() > 1000) {
          e.preventDefault();
          if ($(this).hasClass("hover") ) {
            $(this).removeClass("hover");
            return true;
          } 
          $(".level_1_list_item.hover").removeClass("hover");              
          $(this).addClass("hover");
  
        }
      });
  
      $(".level_2_list").on("touchstart", function(e) {
        if (app.isTabletUserAgent && $(window).width() > 1000) {
          e.stopPropagation();
        }
      });
  
      $(window).on("orientationchange",function(){
  
        $(".level_3_list").css("display", "block");
      });
  
      // popup on guest checkout
      $(document).on("click", ".checkout_guest_section .formfield_button .guestflow", function(e) {
        app.preferences.enableRegistrationModal = false;
        if (!window.enableDisableCheckoutPatch) {
          window.enableDisableCheckoutPatch = true;
          $(this).trigger("click");
        } else {
          window.enableDisableCheckoutPatch = false;
        }
      });
  
      $(document).on("click", ".form-samples .no-sample a, .checkout_guest_section .formfield_button .registerflow", function(e) {            
        app.preferences.enableRegistrationModal = true;
        if (!window.enableDisableCheckoutPatch) {
          window.enableDisableCheckoutPatch = true;
          $(this).trigger("click");
        } else {
          window.enableDisableCheckoutPatch = false;
        }
      });
      /* start fix cart icon overflow on mobile */
      if ($('.navigation').length > 0) {
        $(document).off('touchmove touchstart click', '#nav_overlay').on('touchmove touchstart click', '#nav_overlay', function() {
          app.responsive.closeMobileNavigation();
          $cache.navigation.css("top", "");
        });
      }
      /* end fix cart icon overflow on mobile */
  
      /* start temp fix 1672_1707 hp banners */
      function tempFix1672() {
        $('.hp_slot_1 .contentcarousel_list_item > div').each(function(i, e) {
          for (var i = 0; i < e.attributes.length; i += 1) {
            if (e.attributes[i].value.indexOf('sm=cut') !== -1) {
              e.setAttribute(e.attributes[i].name, e.attributes[i].value.replace('sm=cut', 'sm=fit'));
            }
          }
        });
  
      }
      if (app.isTabletUserAgent || app.isMobileUserAgent) {
        tempFix1672();
      }
      /* endtemp fix 1672_1707 hp banners */
      /* retina hp  banners */
      function tempRetinaHPFix() {
        $('.hp_slot_1 .contentcarousel_list_item > div').each(function(i, e) {                     
          var att = e.getAttribute('data-retina-background');
          var oldName = att.substring(att.lastIndexOf("/")+1, att.lastIndexOf(".")) ;
          var mobAt = e.getAttribute('data-mobile-background');
          var newName =  mobAt.substring(mobAt.lastIndexOf("/")+1, mobAt.lastIndexOf(".")).replace("Mobile-", "Retina-") ;     
          e.setAttribute('data-retina-background', att.replace(oldName, newName));                
        });
  
      }
  
      /* YSL-3292 STEP 2 Carousel FIX*/
      $(document).on('wardrobe.products.loaded',function(){
        $(document).trigger('resize');
      });
      /* END YSL-3292 STEP 2 Carousel FIX*/
  
      /* YSL-1919 fix */
      $(document).on("click", ".productdetails_readmore_container .close", function() {
        $this = $(this);
        setTimeout(function(){$this.parents(".productdetails_readmore_container").css({right: "1700px"})}, 700);  
      });
      /* end YSL-1919*/
  
      /* YSL-2058 fix */
      $(document).on('blur keyup', '.product_engraving_edit_controls_cont input, .engraving_edit_and_preview_cont input[type="text"]', function () {
        var container = $(this).parents('.product_engraving_edit_cont');
        if (container.find('.regular_personal_engraving_style').prop('checked')) {
          $(this).val($(this).val().toUpperCase());
        }
      });
      /*  end YSL-2058 fix */
  
      /* engraving issue */
  
      $(document).on('focus', '.product_engraving_edit_controls_cont input', function(){
        checkEngravingOptions($(this));
      });
      $(document).on('click', '.edit_engraving_dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar-close', function(){
        cartEngravingFixedApplied = false;
      });
      $(document).on('keyup', '.edit_engraving_dialog .personal_engraving_value', handleCartEditEngraving );
      function handleCartEditEngraving() {
        checkEngravingOptions($(this));
        if (!cartEngravingFixedApplied) {
          $(this).blur();
          cartEngravingFixedApplied = true;
        }
      }
      function checkEngravingOptions(inputBox) {
        var chkboxes= inputBox.parents('.product_engraving_edit_cont').find(".engraving_type_controls");
        if (chkboxes.length == 1 ) {
          chkboxes.children('input').attr('checked', 'true');
        }
      }
      /*  end engraving issue */
  
      /* YSL-2090 */
      $(document).on('product.variationChanged', function() {
        initializeMobileThumbnailCarousel();
      });
      $(document).on('quickview.opened', function() {
        initializeMobileThumbnailCarousel();
      });
      function initializeMobileThumbnailCarousel() {
        if (app.isMobileUserAgent) {
          var $carousel = $('#thumbnails .carousel');   
          if ($carousel.length > 0) {
            $carousel
            .removeClass('vertical_carousel')
            .addClass('horizontal_carousel')
            .attr('data-pagination-enabled', 'true')
            .find('.video-thumb').remove();
            app.carousel.init($carousel);
          }
        }
      }
  
      /* end YSL-2090 */
  
      /* YSL-2224 */
      $(document).on('taazImagesLoaded', function() {
        if (app.page.type === 'product') {
          $($("#thumbnails ul").get(0)).addClass("contentcarousel_list");
        }
      });
      /* end YSL-2224 */
  
      /* YSL-2090 */
      $('#thumbnails .carousel').on('jcarousel:animateend', function(event, carousel) {
      // "this" refers to the root element
      // "carousel" is the jCarousel instance
        if ($(this).find(".active").hasClass("taaz-models-list") && app.isMobileUserAgent ) {
          $('.product_primary_image .main_image').addClass("taaz-model-image");
          $(this).find(".active").addClass("selected");
        }
        $(document).on('refinement.update search.update', updateSwatchStyle);
        updateSwatchStyle();
      });
      function updateSwatchStyle() {
        $('.search_result_items .product_tile_wrapper').each(function() {
          var $this = $(this);
  
          if ($this.find('.jcarousel-next:visible').length == 0) {
            $this.find('ul.contentcarousel_list').addClass('aligned-items');
          }
        });
      }
      /* end YSL-2090 */
  
      /* YSL-2273 */
      $(document).on("click", ".quickview .product_primary_image a", function(e){e.preventDefault();})
      /* end YSL-2273 */
      /* YSL-2526 */
      $(document).on('click', '#section_pickyourpout .js_addtocart', function() {$('html').animate({scrollTop : 0}, 'slow'); });
      /* end YSL-2526 */ 
  
      /* YSL-2796 */ 
      $(document).on('change', '.engraving_product_tile .variation_selector select', function() {
        setTimeout(function () { $(document).scrollTop($(document).scrollTop() + 1).scrollTop($(document).scrollTop() -1 ) }, 1000);
      });
      /* End YSL-2796 */

      //     }
      //   });
      // }
  
      // /* END YSL-3055 */  
  });
  
  app.preferences = app.preferences || {};
  app.preferences.rrcontainerprefix = "BVRRInlineRating";
  var cartEngravingFixedApplied = false;
  var currentTabIndex = 0;
  var currentFinishIndex = 0;

  var initializeCount = 0;

     <script>
      // YSL-3423 :: Start

$(document).on('AllJsInitialized', function() {

    (function() {

        function isCurrentPagePDP() {
            return app.pageContextObject.ns === 'product' || app.page.type === 'product';
        }

        function isCurrentPageFoundationFinder() {
            return app.pageContextObject.contentID === 'find-my-shade';
        }

        var $cache = {},
            config = {},
            initialized = false,
            defaultConfig = {
                target: document,
                element: '.js_addtocart',
                wrapper: 'form',
                scrollToTop: app.resources.ADD_TO_CART_SCROLL_TOP_VALUE,
                customButtonElement: null,
                quantityErrorParentSelector: false,
                storePickUpMsg: app.resources.CHOSEN_STORE_PICKUP,
            };

        /**
         * Method for initializing cache variables
         */
        function initializeCache() {
            $cache.target = $(config.target);
            $cache.document = $(document);
            $cache.arData = {};
        }
        /**
         * handle state update
         *
         * @param  {*} newState
         */
        function updateState(newState) {
            if (app.preferences.isPickupInStoreEnabled) {
                var $add2CartBtn,
                    nextState,
                    previousState;
                if ('container' in newState && typeof newState.container === 'object' && newState.container.find('.js_addtocart').length) {
                    $add2CartBtn = newState.container.find('.js_addtocart');
                } else {
                    $add2CartBtn = $cache.target.find(config.element);
                }
                previousState = !!$add2CartBtn.attr('disabled');

                $add2CartBtn.prop('disabled', !newState.hasAutoReplenishment && newState.storePickupID);

                var $bellowMessage = $add2CartBtn.parent().find('.js-bellow-btn_message');

                if (!newState.hasAutoReplenishment && newState.storePickupID) {
                    $add2CartBtn.prop('disabled', true);
                    $bellowMessage.show();
                } else {
                    nextState = previousState || false;
                    $add2CartBtn.prop('disabled', nextState);
                    $bellowMessage.hide();
                }
            }
            if (newState.hasAutoReplenishment) {
                $('.dw-apple-pay-button').hide();
            } else {
                $('.dw-apple-pay-button').show();
            }
        }

        /**
         * Method for initializing event handlers
         * return {void}
         */
        function initializeEvents() {

            app.page.subscribe(updateState);

            $cache.target.off('click', config.element).on('click', config.element, {
                wrapper: config.wrapper,
            }, function(event, data) {
                if ($(this).data('forceStopExecution')) {
                    return;
                }
                data = data || event.data;
                var isRecommendationBlock = $(this).parents('.recommendations_block').length,
                    trackingInfoExtention = null;

                if (isRecommendationBlock) {
                    data.recommendationBlock = true;
                    data.wrapper = '.product_tile_wrapper';
                    data.recommendationTrackingInfo = $(data.wrapper).data('trackinginfo') || $(this).data('trackinginfo');
                } else {
                    data.wrapper = config.wrapper;
                    data.recommendationBlock = false;
                    trackingInfoExtention = $(this).data('trackinginfoextention');

                    if (trackingInfoExtention) {
                        data.trackingInfoExtention = trackingInfoExtention;
                    }
                }
                event.preventDefault();

                // use custom button element in case when config.customButtonElement parameter is specified
                if (config.customButtonElement) {
                    var $buttonElement = app.quickView && app.quickView.isActive() ? $('#QuickViewDialog').find(config.customButtonElement) : $(config.customButtonElement);

                    addProductToCart.call($buttonElement, data);

                    return;
                }
                addProductToCart.call(this, data);
            });

            $cache.document.on('product.variationChanged', variationChangedHandler);

            if (config.scrollToTop) {
                $cache.document.on('global.showMinicart', function() {
                    window.scrollTo(0, 0);
                });
            }
        }

        /**
         * Method for initializing config
         */
        function initializeConfig(params) {
            config = params && params.hasOwnProperty('config') ? $.extend({}, defaultConfig, params.config) : defaultConfig;
        }

        /**
         * Handler for "product.variationChanged" event type which responsible
         * for "add to cart" button update accordingly to current variation product
         *
         * @param {DOMEvent} event Event object instance
         * @param {Object}   data  Event data container object
         */
        function variationChangedHandler(event, data) {
            data = data || {};
            var $container = $(event.target),
                $button = $container.find(config.element),
                pid = typeof data.pid !== 'undefined' ? data.pid : '',
                stockStatus = typeof data.stockStatus !== 'undefined' ? data.stockStatus : '',
                buttonText = typeof data.statusMessage !== 'undefined' ? data.statusMessage : '';

            if (!$button.length || !pid || !stockStatus) {
                return;
            }

            if (buttonText) {
                $button.find('span').html(buttonText);
            }
            $button.removeClass('preorder backorder notifyme');
            $button.data('pid', pid);
            $button.data('stockStatus', stockStatus);

            switch (stockStatus) {
                case 'instock':
                    $button.prop('disabled', false);
                    break;

                case 'preorder':
                    $button.prop('disabled', false);
                    $button.addClass('preorder');
                    break;

                case 'backorder':
                    $button.prop('disabled', false);
                    $button.addClass('backorder');
                    break;

                case 'notifyme':
                    $button.prop('disabled', false);
                    $button.addClass('notifyme');
                    break;
                    // case 'notavalible' :

                default:
                    $button.prop('disabled', true);
            }
        }

        /**
         * Select the changed quantity in case more select elements are available to display different formats
         *
         */
        $(document).on('change', '[name="quantity"]:input', function() {
            var $currentValue = $(this).val();
            var $parent = $(this).closest('div.quantity');

            $parent.find('[name="quantity"]:input').each(function() {
                var $this = $(this);

                $this.val($currentValue);

                if ($this.data('selectBox-selectBoxIt') != undefined) {
                    $this.data('selectBox-selectBoxIt').refresh();
                }
            });
        });

        /**
         * Processing the "add to cart" action
         *
         * @todo Additional review needed
         * @param {Object} params Options object
         */
        function addProductToCart(params) {
            var $this = $(this),
                data = $this.data() || {},
                $wrapper = $this.closest(params.wrapper).length ? $this.closest(params.wrapper) : $this.closest(defaultConfig.wrapper),
                $quantity = $wrapper.find('[name="quantity"]:input'),
                quantity = $quantity.length ? Number($quantity.val()) : 1,
                maxProductSpecificQuantity = typeof($wrapper.find('[name="maxProductSpecificQuantity"]:input')) !== 'undefined' ? $wrapper.find('[name="maxProductSpecificQuantity"]:input').val() : app.preferences.purchaseLimit,
                pid = typeof data.pid !== 'undefined' ? data.pid : $wrapper.find("input[name='pid']").val(),
                stockStatus = typeof data.stockStatus !== 'undefined' ? data.stockStatus : '',
                $productDetails,
                postData = {
                    pid: pid,
                    quantity: quantity,
                };

            if (params.storePickupID) {
                postData.storePickupID = params.storePickupID;
                postData.storePickupName = params.storePickupData.PUiSName;
                postData.storePickupZip = params.storePickupData.PUiSZip;
                postData.pid = params.pid;
            }
            postData.recommendationBlock = params.recommendationBlock;

            var automaticReplenishmentFields = $('#automaticReplenishmentFields'),
                hasAR = $('#delivercustom').is(':checked');

            /**
             * @todo Add description
             */
            var updateARData = function() {
                if (hasAR) {
                    $cache.arData.interval = $('.pdpForm #arMounth').val();
                } else {
                    $cache.arData.interval = '';
                }
            };

            if (automaticReplenishmentFields.length !== 0) {
                updateARData();

                postData.autoReplenishmentInterval = $cache.arData.interval;
                postData.hasAutoReplenishment = hasAR.toString();
            }

            if (stockStatus === 'notifyme' || stockStatus === 'notavalible') {
                return;
            }

            var isSubItem = $this.hasClass('sub_product_item');
            var canAdd = true;

            // Loop over all variants
            $quantity.not('[type=hidden]').each(function() { // don't show message for the hidden input (default of 1) as this overwrites the error message for the actually selected value
                var me = $(this);
                var quantity = me.length ? Number(me.val()) : 1;
                var $addToCart = $wrapper.find('.add_to_cart');
                var PLIsAlreadyInCart = parseInt(app.page.getElement('PLIs')[pid], 10);

                if (isNaN(PLIsAlreadyInCart) || $addToCart.val() == 'Update') {
                    PLIsAlreadyInCart = 0;
                }

                var quantityValidation = app.cart.qtyValidate(pid, parseInt(quantity, 10) + PLIsAlreadyInCart, maxProductSpecificQuantity);
                var quantityErrorParent = config.quantityErrorParentSelector ? me.parents('.quantity') : me.closest('.quantity') || me.parent();

                me.trigger('product.quantityValidation', quantityValidation);

                if ('status' in quantityValidation && quantityValidation.status === 'error') {
                    $cache.document.trigger('addToCartNotification');
                    quantityErrorParent.find('.quantity_error').text(quantityValidation.message).show();
                    canAdd = false;
                    $('.loader').hide();
                } else {
                    quantityErrorParent.find('.quantity_error').hide();
                }
            });

            if (!canAdd) {
                $(document).trigger('updateCartError', {});

                return;
            }

            $wrapper.find('input, select, textarea').each(function(index, element) {
                var $element = $(element),
                    name = $element.attr('name');
                var elemType = $element.attr('type');

                if (name === 'pid' || name === 'quantity') {
                    return;
                }
                if (elemType === 'radio') {
                    postData[name] = $wrapper.find('input[name="' + name + '"]:checked').val();
                } else {
                    postData[name] = $element.val();
                }
            });

            if (config.productDetails) {
                $productDetails = $wrapper.closest(config.productDetails);
            }

            /** fire an event before adding product to cart with data as argument */
            $(document).trigger('beforeCartUpdate', {
                postData: postData
            });

            app.cart.update(postData, {
                /**
                 * @todo Add description
                 * @param  {Object} response
                 */
                html: function(response) {
                    var uuid = $wrapper.find("input[name='uuid']"),
                        pid = postData.pid || $wrapper.find('input[name=pid]').val();

                    $(document).trigger('product.added', params);

                    if (uuid.length > 0 && uuid.val().length > 0 || app.page.params.source == 'cart') {
                        var cartUpdateObj = {
                            wrapper: $wrapper,
                            pid: pid,
                            handled: false,
                        };
                        // Custom event for handling page reload
                        // If reload was handled then handler should set cartUpdateObj.handled to true
                        // to prevent default page reloading
                        $(document).trigger('product.handleCartUpdate', cartUpdateObj);

                        if (!cartUpdateObj.handled) {
                            if ($('.wishlist_page').length) {
                                app.page.redirect(app.urls.wishlistShow);
                            } else if (uuid.length > 0 && uuid.val().length > 0 && app.page.params.source == 'cart') {
                                window.location.href = app.urls.cartShow;
                            } else {
                                window.location.href = window.location.href.split('#')[0];
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        if (!isSubItem && !(typeof OG != 'undefined' && 'Controller' in OG && OG.Controller.addToCart)) {
                            app.quickView.close();
                        }

                        if (app.resources.storeSkinVersion < 3 || isCurrentPagePDP() || isCurrentPageFoundationFinder()) {
                            $(document).trigger('product.addedToCart', {
                                pid: postData.pid,
                                qty: postData.quantity,
                            });
                            $(document).trigger('global.showMinicart', response);
                        }
                    }

                    $(document).trigger('product.addToCartTracking', {
                        basketAmount: $(response).find('.mini_cart_subtotals > .value').text().replace(/\s+/g, ''),
                        basketAmountElement: $(response).find('.mini_cart_subtotals > .value'),
                        basketQuantity: $(response).find('.mini_cart_quantity').first().text().replace(/\D+/g, ''),
                        productID: pid,
                        qty: postData.quantity || 1,
                        trackingJSON: params.trackingInfoExtention,
                        storePickupData: params.storePickupData,
                        hasAutoReplenishment: postData.hasAutoReplenishment,
                        recommendationBlock: postData.recommendationBlock,
                        productDetailsBlock: $productDetails,
                        postData: postData,
                    });

                    $(document).trigger('afterUpdateMiniCart');
                },
                /**
                 * @todo Add description
                 * @param  {Object} response
                 */
                json: function(response) {
                    if (response) {
                        if (response.isAddToCartNotificationEnabled) {
                            $cache.document.trigger('addToCartNotification', response);
                        }
                        $wrapper.find('.quantity_error').text(response.msg || '').show();
                        $(document).trigger('updateCartError', response);
                    }
                },
            });

            // initialize recommendations in minicart if the recommendations component is enabled and available
            if (app.componentsMgr && app.componentsMgr.isComponentEnabled('recommendations') && app.recommendations && typeof app.recommendations.init !== 'undefined') {
                $(document).one('global.showMinicart.opened', function() {
                    app.recommendations.init();
                });
            }
        }

        /** ************* app.components.global.addtocart public object ************** */
        app.components = app.components || {};
        app.components.global = app.components.global || {};
        app.components.global.addtocart = {
            /**
             * @todo Add description
             */
            init: function(params) {
                if (initialized) {
                    return;
                }
                initializeConfig(params);
                initializeCache();
                initializeEvents();
                initialized = true;
            },

            /**
             * Method to re-init addtocart component
             * return {void}
             */
            reinit: function(params) {
                initializeConfig(params);
                initializeCache();
                initializeEvents();
            },
            addProductToCart: addProductToCart,
        };

        app.components.global.addtocart.init();
    }(window.app = window.app || {}, jQuery));
});

// YSL-3423 :: End
     </script>
    </div>
   </div>

/* start 2235 */
if (app.isMobileUserAgent) {
    var target2235 = document.querySelector('#thumbnails .jcarousel-clip > ul');
    
    if (target2235) {
        // create an observer instance
        var observer2235 = new MutationObserver(function (mutations) {
            mutations.forEach(function (mutation) {
                if (mutation.type === 'attributes') {
                    if (!target2235.classList.contains('contentcarousel_list')) {
                        target2235.classList.add('contentcarousel_list');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        // configuration of the observer:
        var config2235 = {
            attributes: true,
            childList: true,
            characterData: true
        };
        // pass in the target node, as well as the observer options
        observer2235.observe(target2235, config2235);
    }
}
